subject: [Radiance-general] Light Shelf Reflections
body:
As a theoretical exercise I am trying to generate a Radiance image (via
Ecotect) of daylight bouncing off a light shelf in a room (30'w x 10.5'h x
60' deep) where the light shelf (top surface), ceiling and the floor are
mirror surfaces (100% reflective and 100% specular) while the walls are non
reflecting black.  I have been unsuccessful, so far, to generate  more than
two reflections.  I would appreciate any help in generating the 3rd, 4th
and subsequent reflections.  I would be happy to send images to anyone
interested.

Shamim Javed
PhD Candidate
College of Architecture and Urban Studies
Virginia Tech
